بڑی کمپنیوں میں عام ایگزیکٹو عہدوں میں س: What is the role of a CTO in large companies? Common executive positions in large companies

A chief technology officer (CTO) (also known as a chief technical officer or chief technologist) is an officer tasked with managing technical operations of an organization. They oversee and supervise research and development and serve as a technical advisor to a higher executive such as a chief executive officer.
What is the role of a CTO in large companies? Common executive positions in large companies

10 Examples of C-Suite Executive Positions ___Chief Executive Officer (CEO) ... ___Chief Financial Officer (CFO) ... ___Chief Operating Officer (COO) ... ___Chief Information Officer (CIO) ... ___Chief Technology Officer (CTO) ... ___Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) ... ___Chief Digital Officer (CDO) ... ___Chief Experience Officer (CXO)
سی ٹی او کا مطلب چیف ٹیکنالوجی آفیسر ہوت: What is a CTO? CTO stands for Chief Technology Officer. They are the technical manager responsible for the development of information systems. At Esade, we take an in-depth look at their importance and their functions, many of which are shared with the organization's CIO.
